languages.text: И послал вокс-сигнал к Вольному Торговцу настоятель Гектархиус, и возмолился он: "Не губи, забери нас под руку свою, ибо вернутся сии лихие люди и будут месть творити".

And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."
languages.original_text: И послал вокс-сигнал к Вольному Торговцу настоятель Гектархиус, и возмолился он: "Не губи, забери нас под руку свою, ибо вернутся сии лихие люди и будут месть творити".

traits.locale_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox transmission to the Rogue Trader beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox transmission to the Rogue Trader beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

languages.text: Después, el prelado Hectarchius envió una vocotransmisión a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, implorándole: «No nos dejéis caer en la destrucción, y protegednos, ya que esta gente es malvada y volverá para cobrarse su venganza».
languages.original_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: Después, el prelado Hectarchius envió una vocotransmisión a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, implorándole: «No nos dejéis caer en la destrucción, y protegednos, ya que esta gente es malvada y volverá para cobrarse su venganza».

languages.text: 赫克塔奇乌斯教长向行商浪人发了一条音阵信息，恳求道：“请不要弃我们于不顾，向我们伸出援手吧，因为这些邪恶之人会回来报复我们。”
languages.original_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: 赫克塔奇乌斯教长向行商浪人发了一条音阵信息，恳求道：“请不要弃我们于不顾，向我们伸出援手吧，因为这些邪恶之人会回来报复我们。”

languages.text: そして上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは、自由開拓者にヴォクス通信を送り「我々を殺さないでほしい。どうか救いの手を差し伸べてください。あの恐ろしい者達が復讐を胸に戻ってくるのです」と懇願した。
languages.original_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: そして上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは、自由開拓者にヴォクス通信を送り「我々を殺さないでほしい。どうか救いの手を差し伸べてください。あの恐ろしい者達が復讐を胸に戻ってくるのです」と懇願した。

languages.text: Und Prälat Hectarchius schickte eine Vox-Übertragung an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und flehte: "Vernichtet uns nicht, sondern breitet eine schützende Hand über uns aus, denn diese bösen Leute werden zurückkehren, um Rache zu üben."
languages.original_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: Und Prälat Hectarchius schickte eine Vox-Übertragung an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und flehte: "Vernichtet uns nicht, sondern breitet eine schützende Hand über uns aus, denn diese bösen Leute werden zurückkehren, um Rache zu üben."

languages.text: Le prélat Hectarchius envoie alors une transmission-vox {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} pour {mf|le|la} supplier : « Épargnez-nous. Plutôt que de nous détruire, accordez-nous votre protection, car ces mécréants reviendront crier vengeance. »
languages.original_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: Le prélat Hectarius envoie alors une transmission-vox {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} pour {mf|le|la} supplier : « Épargnez-nous. Plutôt que de nous détruire, accordez-nous votre protection, car ces mécréants reviendront crier vengeance. »

languages.text: Piskopos Hectarchius, Hür Tacir'e istirhamda bulunan bir voks iletisi gönderdi: "Bizi yok etmeyin, onun yerine bize yardım eli uzatın çünkü o aşağılık insanlar intikam arayışında geri dönecektir."
languages.original_text: And Prelate Hectarchius sent a vox-transmission to the Rogue Trader, beseeching, "Destroy us not, but extend a hand of protection over us, for these wicked people will return to exact their vengeance."

traits.locale_text: Psikopos Hectarchius, Hür Tacir'e istirhamda bulunan bir voks iletisi gönderdi: "Bizi yok etmeyin, onun yerine bize yardım eli uzatın çünkü o aşağılık insanlar intikam arayışında geri dönecektir."
